recommendations: Enhance audio clarity by using an external microphone rather than the built-in camera mic.
Record in a quiet environment to minimize background noise.
Add audio, even if it's just background music or sounds of the dog playing, to enhance the viewing experience.
Include shots of the puppy interacting with people or other objects to create a narrative and increase engagement.
